member.summary: A secure, reliable binding suitable for cross-machine communication.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the type of security used specified.
member.param: The value that specifies the type of security used with the binding.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified configuration name.
member.param: The binding configuration name for the .

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.CreateBindingElements
member.summary: Creates a collection with the binding elements for the binding.
member.returns: The of type that makes up the binding.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.EnvelopeVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of SOAP that is used for messages processed by this binding.
member.returns: The value of the that is used with this binding. The value is SOAP 1.2.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.MaxBufferPoolSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding.
member.returns: The maximum size allowed for a buffer pool that stores TCP messages processed by the binding. The default value is 524,288 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory.
member.returns: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer used to store messages in memory. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.MaxReceivedMessageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, for a received message that is processed by the binding.
member.returns: The maximum size (in bytes) for a received message that is processed by the binding. The default value is 65,536 bytes.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.ReaderQuotas
member.summary: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
member.returns: The that specifies the complexity constraints on soap messages exchanged. The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.Scheme
member.summary: Returns the URI scheme for the transport.
member.returns: The URI scheme for the transport, which is "net.tcp".

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.Security
member.summary: Gets an object that specifies the type of security used with services configured with this binding.
member.returns: The that contains the types of security used with this binding. The default mode of security for the NetTCPBinding is .

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.NetTcpBinding.TransferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.
member.returns: The value that indicates whether the service configured with the binding uses streamed or buffered (or both) modes of message transfer.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement
member.summary: An abstract class that supplements the base with additional properties that are common to connection-oriented transports such as TCP and named pipes.

member.summary: Determines whether a channel factory of the specified type can be built.
member.typeparam: The type of channel to check.
member.returns: true if a channel factory can be built; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer used to transmit a chunk of the serialized message on the wire from the client or service.
member.returns: The size of the connection buffer. The default value is 8192 bytes.
member.exception: The value is less than zero.

member.name: M:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.GetProperty``1(System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext)
member.summary: Gets properties from the binding stack, if present.
member.returns: A T object from the binding stack, if present.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer to use. For streamed messages, this value should be at least the maximum possible size of the message headers, which are read in buffered mode.
member.returns: The maximum number of bytes that are used to buffer incoming messages in memory. The default value is 65,536 bytes.
member.exception: The value is less than or equal to zero.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the messages are buffered or streamed with the connection-oriented transport.
member.returns: A value which indicates whether a channel uses streamed or buffered modes of message transfer. The default is .
member.exception: The value is not a valid .

member.summary: Specifies client authentication using a certificate.

member.name: T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpConnectionPoolSettings
member.summary: Represents properties that control the behavior of the TCP connection pool.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpConnectionPoolSettings.GroupName
member.summary: Gets or sets the group name of the connection pool group on the client.
member.returns: The group name of the connection pool group on the client. The default name is "default".

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpConnectionPoolSettings.IdleTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.
member.returns: Returns a structure that indicates the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.
member.exception: The value is less than zero.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpConnectionPoolSettings.LeaseTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time span after which a connection in the connection pool is closed.
member.returns: Returns a structure that indicates the time span after which a cached TCP connection is purged from the connection pool.
member.exception: The value cannot be less than zero.

member.name: P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpConnectionPoolSettings.MaxOutboundConnectionsPerEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool.
member.returns: The maximum number of allowed outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool. The default value is 10.
member.exception: The value is less than or equal to zero.
